cause.description:
Have you ever noticed that people that smoke weed like to smoke different types and strenghts but in South Africa there are only a few people that know how to grow the stuff. This is the reason many people are paying R70 to R100 a G "MAD!!!". My ambistion is to stop the madness and get the price of good scaffe DOWN. Let all the weed smokers out there hear my call and unite agents the high price of good kron. If you love the kron then help me to help you.
1. GOOD smoke for everyone !!!
2. A friend with weed is a friend indeed!!!
3. FREE TING 4 ALL
cause.mission: Help SA with Some GOOD KRON
cause.name: The Grow Room
